MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KA1 postcode area of Kilmarnock, affecting properties in Nursery Gardens and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6:55pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of the fault and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by midnight. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:31pm on Thursday the 1st April
